info.title: Echo API
info.description: This document describes the `EchoService` service and all its corresponding RPCs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the team.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: / Id is the unique identifier of the team.

fid.description: fid is the unique identifier of the action.

matchFid.description: match_fid is the unique identifier of the match where the action occurred.

projectKey.description: project_key is the key of the project to which the action belongs.

deviceId.description: device_id is the identifier of the device that recorded the action.

competitionFid.description: competition_fid is the unique identifier of the competition where the action occurred.

teamFid.description: team_fid is the unique identifier of the team that performed the action.

actor.description: Actor represents the type of Actor who performed the action.

code.description: code represents the code of the action.

subCode.description: sub_code represents the sub-code of the action.

value.description: value is the value associated with the action.

result.description: result indicates whether the action was successful or not.

period.description: period represents the period of the match when the action occurred.

time.description: time is the time when the action occurred.

matchTime.description: match_time is the time of the match when the action occurred.

sequence.description: sequence is the sequence number of the action in the match.

position.description: position is the position on the field where the action occurred.

zone.description: zone is the zone on the field where the action occurred.

createdAt.description: created_at is the timestamp when the action was created.

updatedAt.description: updated_at is the timestamp when the action was last updated.

v1Action.description: Action represents a single action in a match.

v1Actor.description:
Actor represents the type of Actor in a match.

 - ACTOR_PLAYER_UNSPECIFIED: PLAYER represents a player in the match.
 - ACTOR_TEAM: TEAM represents a team in the match.
 - ACTOR_COACH: COACH represents a coach in the match.
 - ACTOR_BENCH: BENCH represents the bench in the match.

fid.description: fid is the unique identifier of the Actor type.

type.description: type is the type of the Actor.

v1ActorType.description: ActorType represents the type of Actor.

v1BoxScore.title: TODO: La tarea est√° mal definida (es tremendo copypaste) https://jiranbn23.atlassian.net/browse/CM-6670

v1CODE.description:
CODE represents the code of an action in a match.

 - CODE_POINTS_UNSPECIFIED: CODE_POINTS represents a points action.
 - CODE_FOUL: CODE_FOUL represents a foul action.
 - CODE_RECEIVE: CODE_RECEIVE represents a receive action.
 - CODE_REBOUND: CODE_REBOUND represents a rebound action.
 - CODE_ASSIST: CODE_ASSIST represents an assist action.
 - CODE_TURNOVER: CODE_TURNOVER represents a turnover action.
 - CODE_STEAL: CODE_STEAL represents a steal action.
 - CODE_BLOCK: CODE_BLOCK represents a block action.
 - CODE_SWAP: CODE_SWAP represents a swap action.
 - CODE_TIMEOUT: CODE_TIMEOUT represents a timeout action.

fid.description: The unique identifier for the event.

projectKey.description: The project key associated with the event.

competitionFid.description: The unique identifier for the competition associated with the event.

payload.description: The payload data associated with the event.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

matchFid.description: match_fid is the unique identifier of the match where the event occurred.

period.description: period represents the period of the match when the event occurred.

time.description: time is the time when the event occurred.

v1EventPayload.description: EventPayload represents the payload of an event.

boxScores.description: / BoxScores is the box score of the match.

v1GetBoxScoresResponse.description: / BoxScore represents the box score of a match.

matches.description: / Matches is the list of live matches.

v1GetLiveMatchesResponse.description: / GetLiveMatchesResponse represents the response to get the live matches.

actions.description: / PlayByPlay is the play by play of the match.

events.description: / Events is the events of the match.

v1GetPlayByPlayResponse.description: / GetPlayByPlayResponse represents the response to get the play by play of a match.

players.description: / Players is the list of players from the team.

v1GetPlayersFromTeamResponse.description: / GetPlayersFromTeamResponse represents the response to get the players from a team.

projectKey.description: / id is the unique identifier of the match.

competitionFid.description: / fid is the unique Firebase ID of the match.

matchFid.description: / fid is the unique Firebase ID of the match.

v1MatchKey.description: / MatchKey represents the key of a match.

fid.description: / fid is the unique Firebase ID of the player.

name.description: / name is the first name of the player.

surname.description: / surname is the last name of the player.

license.description: / license is the player's license number.

imageUrl.description: / image_url is the URL of the player's image.

id.description: / id is the unique ID of the player.

team.description: / team is the name of the team the player belongs to.

number.description: / number is the player's jersey number.

play.description: / play indicates whether the player is currently playing.

start.description: / start indicates whether the player started the game.

captain.description: / captain indicates whether the player is the team captain.

projectKey.description: / project_key is the key of the project the player is associated with.

created.description: / created indicates whether the player's profile has been created.

healthCheck.description: / health_check indicates whether the player has passed the health check.

hidePersonalData.description: / hide_personal_data indicates whether to hide the player's personal data.

v1Player.description: / Player represents a player in a game.

v1Subcode.description:
SUB_CODE represents the sub-code of an action in a match.

 - SUBCODE_IN_ARC_UNSPECIFIED: IN_ARC represents an action inside the arc.
 - SUBCODE_OUT_ARC: OUT_ARC represents an action outside the arc.
 - SUBCODE_FREE_THROW: FREE_THROW represents a free throw action.
 - SUBCODE_DUNK: DUNK represents a dunk action.
 - SUBCODE_OFFENSIVE_REBOUND: OFFENSIVE_REBOUND represents an offensive rebound action.
 - SUBCODE_DEFENSIVE_REBOUND: DEFENSIVE_REBOUND represents a defensive rebound action.
 - SUBCODE_RECEIVE_BLOCK: RECEIVE_BLOCK represents a block received action.
 - SUBCODE_RECEIVE_FOUL: RECEIVE_FOUL represents a foul received action.
 - SUBCODE_TECHNICAL: TECHNICAL represents a technical foul action.
 - SUBCODE_UNSPORTSMANLIKE: UNSPORTSMANLIKE represents an unsportsmanlike foul action.
 - SUBCODE_DISQUALIFYING: DISQUALIFYING represents a disqualifying foul action.
 - SUBCODE_BRAWL: BRAWL represents a brawl action.
 - SUBCODE_SWAP_IN: SWAP_IN represents a swap in action.
 - SUBCODE_SWAP_OUT: SWAP_OUT represents a swap out action.
